content.detailedDescription: I again asked that you come and check is out. i understand that we should not find this. but i am old school and i know we can see things that we can not get any proof. but if we can touch it  then we have proof. do not check it out for me or yourself check for all the people that have put ther necks out when they file a report and are call crazy. all they asked is that you touch it and then have a say. i hope you would come and touch it. if not please call me and i will report it to the newspaper so that we will all have this information. i thank you for your time and hope you come.
content.summary: Very old ufo underwater

content.detailedDescription: I live in ricmond,va.My friend and i were on our way to another friend house off of hull st.We go down a back road to get to his house.My friend was driving,i was in the passengers seat.You could stare ahead and see the clear night sky,not too many stars were out that night.Im a star gazer so im always looking.It just so happens this one night,not to sure the exact date,im looking.I see this big luminated green ball hovering,where it came from i havent a clue, it was just there.I think that radio went out because it was silent when this happened.It was perfectly still and you couldnt hear a thing.I was wondering what in the world could this be,but in my heart i knew exactly what it was.The more we go down this street,the more you could see this object.Then,about a few moments later it just takes off straight up in the air.Just gone.It was so fast going into the sky.It was amazing.I was in awe.I sat silent for a minute,then i looked to my friend and asked him if he had seen anything,not saying what i saw,he described the same thing.I was kind of nervous because i wasn't sure if he had seen it also.After he admits what he saw,we bothed talked about it very excited knowing that what we had saw was not from this world.We were histaricle by the time we got to my other friends house,trying to tell them our story,and of course they didnt believe us.But this is true,and i completely stick to my story
content.summary: Green ball hovering,then takes off straight up

content.detailedDescription: Icame out from the baseball batting cages here in burleson w/my 9 year old son. got in the truck. we began pulling out of parking spot and as i looked in sky to side of his window i saw a brilliant yellow lite like a star getting closer to earth. i yelled at him to turn and look, look at it. it came faster and got faster very quickly. then left a trail of several little yellow brilliant lights. it then appeared to just stop and i assumed maybe it burned out as falling stars may. i've checked the weather.Gov and they don't show any falling stars or metorites. my son didn't look fast enough to see this out his window. i don't have photos and figured it was a star so didnt report it but now that tx seems to have a rash of people seeing things i thought it best. perhaps others have seen this at night too and will now come forward or have already done so. this may help back up their stories.
content.summary: Very bright object in sky. yellow brilliant color

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed others at the beach looking up at something so out of curiosity i began to scan the sky to see what they were looking at.  i could not at first see anything in the clear blue sky in the direction they were looking.  it was maybe two thirds of the way from the horizon to direct overhead - approximately northwest of vancouver city - i was at the university of british columbia at wreck beach.  
i did not talk to them until i saw a very very small black dot against the otherwise clear blue sky.  the dot did not seem to move or change in color or shape - it was static.  i then asked them what they saw and they told me they didn't know but it was a small black circle.  we looked at this dot for maybe one minute and more and more people saw it - perhaps six.  suddenly as i was looking at it it just seemed to vaanish into thin air without moving or changing in any way.  i did not see it any longer and i asked others if they could see it and noone could see it again.  i scanned the sky but could not find it or anything else unusual again. 
i thought the object could have been a distant black balloon or a very very distant hovering craft of some kind - perhaps an unconventional military aircraft as there is an air force base not far away on vancouver island.
content.summary: I looked up in the clear blue sky and saw a very small or very distant black circle in the sky not moving

content.detailedDescription: I was in the country right outside fortworth near benbrook lake and i was at my friend's "horse-back riding instructor getting ready to have a lesson and i went out of her house and went to go get her pony and i was just staring of into space looking for shooting stars like i had been the past few nights and i saw what i thought was just a regular airplane flying to chigago or wherever and as i looked closer i didnt see the usual blinking red light i saw what looked to be like a an aircraft that was really high but seemed to be huge with a really big really bright light it seemed at times it went really fast and at other times it didnt seem to hardly move. i took the pony in the barn and walked to my friends house i was standing on the porch to take another look and as i concentrated on the aircraft i could hear a noise. i went inside and told them what i had seen my mom and her came outside and looked they told me it was probably military menuvers. as i stared at the aircrafts again the noise didnt sound like a jet and it didnt sound silent like an airplane that i would usually see going over. it sounded more like the ships from independence day and war of the worlds. as i saw them go further in the distance i dismissed the whole convesation.
content.summary: Airplane like aircraft making strange noise an bright light bigger than a star and brighter

content.detailedDescription:
Around 10:40 pm, temperature around 40 degrees. large bell shaped object moving around fm 205. shortly after disappearance, another jet team flew by same as jan. 8th sighting. they flew about a mile above the ground, less than half a mile apart going south- south west.


i was sitting inside my house watching tv when i heard my blue heeler barking uncontrollably and heard my horse's galloping about the pasture. i went out on my back porch to see what was going on and saw the "ufo" hovering about half a mile above ground in the pasture next to our house. it had oval shaped bright white lights that danced about. often making triangle shapes and then submerging into one bright light. i figured it had been there for quite some time seeing as for about an half hour my electronics in my house where making strange humming noises and having satellite disturbances with my direct tv.

i heard the jets from a distance, looked like they were coming from the ft. worth area. when i looked at the jets and looked back to the hovering ufo, its lights blinked 4 times, went black and quickly shot off to the south towards hico.


also, in addition to the jan 8th sightings. i remember heading back on 281 south bound when i spotted several us government issued cars- liscense plates stating so. i text my husband that i thought maybe the president was heading back to texas when i came to a stop at rocky point baptist church when i saw strange lights. followed by the two low flying jets. i'm trying to contact my wireless dealer so i can gain info on what times those texts were sent so i can give an exact time of which i saw the lights and jets fly over head.
content.summary: Mile long, bell shaped. bright white lights

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home on hwy 85.
near platteville, co
saw one single light bright.  i thought i was watching a plane with landing lights on.  as it changed angle in the sky it turned from one light to 2 sets of 3 long lights on each side.  angled like wings would be.  just on the side of one light it looked grey.  the lights were bright white.  direction was north when it was one single light.  started to change direction,turning toward the east than saw the 2 sets of 3 long lights.  finished turn to the south.  lights stayed on til i couldnt see it anymore.
i reported this to weld county mufon and the national reporting center.
content.summary: 2 sets of 3 lights long

content.detailedDescription:
I don't know what this was, but it's pretty clear what it was not. i'm 46 years old and have been watching the sky when it's absolutely clear since i was a young kid. i was out walking my dog on the lake and the sky was completely clear. i looked up and started to catch a falling star out of the corner of my eye. it was the coolest falling star i'd ever seen because it didn't burn up within a nano second of my spotting it. after another second or two i started to realize what i was looking at wasn't typical at all. it was burning, but not burning up and it was getting bigger. turns out it wasn't falling, but traversing the sky. i have no idea how big it was because i don't know how high it was in the sky. it traversed the sky to the point of disappearing in about 12-15 seconds. it normally takes a jet that is moving to the point of disappearing at least a couple of minutes if not more (i should point out that they are either landing at msp or leaving msp).

i haven't told many people about this. it's pretty clear to me what it was not. what exactly it was, i don't know. it was moving very fast and on fire, like it had just broken into our atmosphere (the fire suggested that as well given it was more on the front). it was probably much higher than i estimated too, which means it was also large, possibly quite large, but that is speculation. 

after time, you start to brush it off, but after hearing about the texas town seeing the ufo i had to write about it. i emailed the local tv station weather departments and the claimed to not hear anything about it from anyone else.  i still haven't heard about anyone else seeing this, which is unlikely given how clear the sky was. if you're reading this and saw the same thing, feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Falling star that wasn't falling, not burning up either

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside my brothers room window at night smoking a ciggarette then a object all of a sudden appear very close over the roof of my house and was just gliding threw the air at first i thought it was a plane cause i see planes in the back of my house from far flying constantly every night but this one was different it was not shape like a plane in no way and had a bunch of lights lighting up, it was about 40 - 60 feet from the ground just gliding threw the air making no sounds at all and if it was a plane i always hear the engine of the planes and they are never this low to the ground, this one had no sound at all coming from it, at first i was shocked at what i was seeing i literally just froze watching it fly over my house and then it continue gliding threw the air about 40-60 feet off the ground then i ran fast and called my brother and by the time we came back it was already gone.
content.summary: Cigar shape with lots of lights underneath it, made no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the grocery store with my daughter, and a few seconds later i noticed some strange lights low in the sky that were square looking. i thought it was an airplane at an odd angle. it looked square at first. then,after a few seconds, it never morphed into something familiar, so i kept my eyes on it. i told my daughter to look at it. she too thought it looked very odd. then i noticed that it was not square, nor was it high up like an airplane should be. it was lower. like a little over 10 stories up. (the hospital i work at is ten stories, so i thought of that as a comparison) it was a definate boomerang shaped. my daughter said it looked like a plane with really bent wings. overall it was a v-shape. it had red and yellow lights. not blinking. it was moving slower than a plane or a remote-control plane would move. (i actually thought it might be a remote control plane at first, when i decided it was way too low to be a real plane), but then it was just too big to be anything like any remote control plane that i had ever seen. plus... it was silent. i had slowed down, and was literally hanging out my rolled down window looking up at it. it was traveling perpindicular to the road that i was on.  the car behnd me was honking it 's horn... obviuosly not noticing it. i wanted to chase it, but could not turn around to do so because of the traffic. the entire encouter lasted only seconds, but what i noticed was that it was low-flying, and silent. there was no sound. i am familiar with helicopters... sometimes they are landing at the hospital where i work, and even with my windows shut, i can hear them well when they are that high up in the air. this object made no noise. it was traveling at the speed of a car, not an aircraft. it was more like it was floating than flying. the craft was dark against the sky, it was v-shaped, with red and yellow lights all around the perimeter. it was the size of a very small car. larger than a golf cart, but smaller than any small plane. it was something that i could not explain. i've never seen anything in my life that i couldn't put into some kind of category in my mind. this was different. i did notice that the near-by military base was firing off flares that night. they often do that, and i am very familiar with flares and what they look like. this looked like a man-made craft, flying very slow, low, and silent through the night. i wondered if it was some military craft or something. it was flying in a direction away from the base. probably too low to be on any radar. (i think). the object was not doing any fancy maneuvering, it was just flying/floating in a straight line, silently, and i lost site of it, when it went behind my field of vision, over the road. i couldn't turn around. or look at it as it was directly overhead and behind me. then it was lost behind a tree line. 
my feelings during the whole encouter were matter of fact. i was honestly trying to fit it into some file in my mind, it was only a few minutes later that it kind of struck me as really strange because there was no where to file this event. i've never seen anything to compare.
content.summary: Low flying boomerang shape size of small car with lights

content.detailedDescription:
It was like 12:05 i was at home going to sleep and then my aunt screamed at me to look outside through the window i looked and there were two flying objects in the sky infront of my nieghbors yard 

at first i thought it was an airplane

i ran and told my mom and me and my mom and aunt went outside to look  what they were 

i saw one moving to the right then disappear then i saw two more to the left 

there was one just hovering in the sky 

i told my aunt to get in my car to go look closer but she said no i got in my car and went off to see what they were they disappeared except one that i found near lancaster and oakland as i accelerated it would move faster then i followed it to the anttena for the news station in front of the store new quick way shopping on meadowbrook it looked like it landed on the anttena then the lights turned off

what gave it away that it was not an airplane is that it was going to the right then it stopped immediatly then went left fast and i mean fast
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright blue and red lights spinning moving back forth across sky

content.detailedDescription: I left roswell, nm where i was visiting family for christmas around 7:45pm. i was heading back to school in tx, so i drove west out of roswell on us 380 towards tatum, nm. the distance if my memory is right is about 72 miles. it was dark and a big storm was heading in from the north. it rained the entire trip home. i stopped in tatum to get a bite to eat and use the restroom at the gas station there in town. on my way, out of the parking lot i was pulled over by the local police who sent me on my way. i proceeded on us 380 west, it was dark, and raining, there werent very many cars on the road at the time when i was about 10 miles texas side of tatum. i was listening to cds and smoking a cigarette, when a bright light shot down from the sky and proceeded to brighten the road in front of me for atleast 5 minutes. i pressed my face as far to the windshield as possible without loosing control of the car and looked up, and all i could see was a bright light, no fiqure, just a solid bright white light. it appeared to be possitioned directly above my car, though the light remained on the road ahead. the light vanished, and it was dark again till i passed the next car a couple miles down the road. my heart was racing the entire time, i couldnt believe what was happening, i had driven this road and many in the area at night before and never has this happened. i honestly cannot explain it.
content.summary: Driving us380 east when light shined on road in front of vehicle.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my driveway a little before 6:00 jumping rope and watching the airplanes.  then i saw a black dot appear next to one of the airplanes.  i stopped jumping rope so that i could get a clearer picture.  then i looked away for a couple of seconds and it was gone.  then i ran inside to tell my dad and my coach what i had seen, but they did not believe me.  so i went back to jump some more and i saw it again.  this time i saw it with lights on the bottom of it and it slowly descended until it went out of sight.  the next day, my coach sent an email saying that maybe they should not have dismissed my ufo sighting so quickly.  there had been many sighting reported about the same time as i had seen it.
content.summary: A black dot popped out the sky and then desappeared.  then it came back descending with lights on the bottom of it.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom.  i woke up at 5:10am to the sound of my alarm clock radio.  i walked up to the clock and noticed that there was also a very weird creepy sound coming from outside.  i turned off the alarm clock and heard the sound for about 2 minutes.  the sound was a low and mid range hum that was also ocillating (going wow wow wow) but very fast.  i have very good hearing i am also an audio engineer.  i slowly walked to the window and peered outside.  i thought i was about to see a ufo or something but i didn't see anything weird.  i couldn't see my dogs because they were probably sleeping in their dog house.  i could see the whole backyard and i saw nothing different.  while i was looking for the source of the sound i could hear it.  the sound sounded like it was right over my house.  just then my wife who was in deep sleep said sleepely "baby don't scare me".  she remembers hearing the sound too and said it didn't sound like anything she has ever heard before.  i first thought the sound was a car or something.  my brain could not identify this sound.  i felt fear, curiosity, and concern.  i should have grabbed my camera or my gun but i was drawn to the sound.  like myself we are both afraid of the greys and i do believe i have been abducted throughout my life.  the sound lasted for a couple of minutes and then stopped.  it didn't get quieter it just stopped.  i had the creeps when walking out the front door.
content.summary: Unknown ufo sound above my house in manor tx.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back porch smoking a cigarette. i don't smoke inside the house so i step out every few hours to have one.   i looked to the east and saw a golden lights coming towards my direction so i stepped out into the yard thinking i would get a better view than under the porch. my first thoughts were it was a large aircraft but then my mind quickly changed as the object came overhead.  the altitude was so low i felt like i could reach out and touch it. there were at least 20 non blinking lights orange / golden with red ones intermingled.  the lights were in a rectangular pattern. i estimate the craft to be about a mile long. there was a low hum as it passed over head then nothing.  it came into sight and departed over the horizon in less than a minute heading from east to west.   


my reaction was amazement. i've seen a lot of different type of aircraft but never anything that huge and quiet.   i called a relative as soon as it flew over and let them know what i saw. i lost view of the object as it disappeared over the horizon.
content.summary: Rectanglur huge craft moving fast

content.detailedDescription: My step son and i were leaving the house to run an errand.  as we walked out to the car i noticed a bright orange object just above the trees to the east.  it was in the same area of the sky as mars but was much brighter and was moving away from us. at first i thought it was a meteorite burning up in the atmosphere.  i quickly realized that it was moving too slowly to be a meteorite so i stopped and took a good look at it. it was kind of square in shape at the top and the light faded away towards the bottom.  (i���ve included an image that i created with photoshop.)  it almost looked like the glow of a jet engine from a side view.  i can assure you that it was not a jet engine as there was absolutely no noise.  i live near nas oceana air base and know what jet noise is.  the object was starting to disappear behind the trees so we got in the car and headed toward our destination. once we were out of the neighborhood, we could once again see the object.  it was much further away and only appeared as a bright point of light.  as we kept an eye on it i saw a smaller light slowly descend from the object.  as the smaller object descended below the tree line, the larger object pulsated a few times then vanished.   i've been reading other ufo reports since this occured and was amazed by the similarities in some of them.  it seems rather common to see a smaller object descend followed by the primary object pulsating and disappearing.  i can���t help but wonder what these things are dropping off???
content.summary: Bright orange object flying silently over virginia beach. a second smaller object descended just before larger object vanishes.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home after broadcasting a basketball game on the evening of january 8th, i was was driving down my street heading east.. i saw thru the trees, what look like a very, very bright light. and this is what got my attention.. i drove past the trees and saw what looked like two very bright light, one on top of another, almost in an hourglass shape..  i did not notice any movement.. i do not think it was venus, or any planet, and have not seen this light or lights since. but, again, it was the vividness, brightness, that got my attention at first.. i am somewhat of a skeptic in outer-worldy beings, but this sure got me thinking.. i am 47 years old, work in radio, and have never seen anything like this before..
content.summary: Hourglass shape

content.detailedDescription:
I work 2nd shift at lockheed martin aircraft (so i do know planes)in fort worth,texas.On my way home (i have a 75 mile one way commute) as i was apporoaching a private air port in a gated sub-division named bourland field just off of hwy 377 heading west towards the towns of cresson then granbury on a low cloud foggy night which the fog was above me over head some 200 feet or so a black triangle craft crossed across hwy 377 towards the bourland field runway going south. it turned above the runway looking as though it was going to land heading north but when it rreached the end of the runway it turned 90 degrees  left to the west but then turned abruptly 180 degrees back to the east all in near one move.It sat in place just over the landing beacon next to the first east most house in the division. i had stopped and got out of my car in the turn lane adjacent to the beacon and stood and watched the triangle for over three minutes as it sat in air making no sound whatsoever.Along with the nose and wing type lights it had a muted white light dead center underneath the craft. i was about 60 or 70 yards away from the craft and it was about 100 feet or less in the air.I could see it clearly it had no tail section it had no engine flame or propeller visible .It was a narrow tapered triangle .The light on the bottom i at first thought it must of been for landing gear but no doors were open that i could see.
others seen it as cars were passing behind me but no one else stopped. i was in no hurry as it takes me a hour and a half to get home anyway.
this is the 3rd such siting i've had in the last three years.The first was around 2 years ago in the spring and on my way home i seen a giant triangle that was at least a mile across in each direction hovering in place more than a mile up in the air on a moonlite (3/4) semi-cloudy night.It was april or may in 2006 over the town of glen rose,texas. it had no lights that i could see but stood out more because no light was reflecting off of it like it was on the clouds.This thing was a monster.
i told my co-workers the next day at work about the latest siting and they kidded me about little green men and flying saucers etc..Un til one of my other co-workers said that she too had seen it but thought it was some nasa drone (as she does still to this day) ownly when the news in the past few days has been up in arms about ufo's in stephenville texas has anyone thought me as crazy .So i've been vendicated and i'm only slightly old aged crazed now. that's my story .The 3rd sighting was also on hwy 377 just out of benbrook texas where one trianle(again) split off into 3 pieces the outer two flew up into the sky so fast they disappeared .
content.summary: Black triangle size of fighter plane bright lights on nose red green lights on wing

content.detailedDescription:
We were traveling from archer city to brownwood, texas. outside of breckenridge, i told my husband to look at those bright lights in the sky.  he also saw them.  it almost looked liked car lights spread out with a very large light in the center (probably about 3-4 times bigger than outside lights.  there were 3 sets of them in a straight line, really huge.  each light blinked off and on at different intervals, then the end lights faded out, followed by the first and second sets.  thinking this was really weird, (i figured maybe it was some kind of military pratice), i kept my eyes on the sky looking for other lights.  about the time we were outside cisco, i told my husband to look at the sky again.  there were some more lights.  this time there were just 3 huge bright lights in a line across the sky.  they seemed to be darting back and forth.  the only other way to explain it was maybe there were more lights and they flashed off and on and just looked to be darting.....Then all of them faded.  i had never seen anything like this before and told my husband i figured if i ever had, i would have been scared, but i wasn't.  perhaps if i had been traveling alone, i might have been.  it was a really neat and am very glad i got to experience it.  
  by the way, when i heard others had seen them, i realized that these lights were probably over the stephenville area.  also, i had a camera in the back of the car.  i was really mad at myself when i realized i could have taken pictures.  there was plenty of time to do so.
content.summary: 3 sets of 3 very bright lights. center light much bigger than lights on each side.  then later 3 very large bright lights flashing on and off, darting, then fading.

content.detailedDescription: i was driving eastbound through louisiana on interstate 10.  it was night time and i saw a huge ball of light hovering just over the trees.  it was far away but very big, and it was strobing.   it then then zipped away in a westward direction at very high speed.
content.summary: I saw an huge ball of strobing light.  it hovered then zipped away at very high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
On a winter night my grandfather(a life-long star gazer)was in his rocking chair on our front lawn.He was scanning the skies as he did on many occasions.Suddenly,he jumped out of his chair & called to my father & mother(his son-in-law & daughter)to come outside because he had sighted some strange lights in the sky.My father,mother,my siblings & i all came outside & were able to see four red lights evenly spaced from one another flying in a diamond pattern.They appeared in the wsw & were moving to the n along the western horizon @ about a 20 degree angle.My father said they were probably four helicopters coming up from homestead air force base(hafb,is further sw of my parents').Their was some discussion amongst my family as to whether or not that was what we were seeing.An immense tree occupied the back lawn of our neighbors house(we lived on an intersection,our house was the ne corner & the position we faced was the sw corner,later we were facing directly w towards the nw corner house)& we were able to catch glimpses of the items as they traveled.As the objects cleared the tree line(about 25 degrees)& were further north we noticed that they had moved closer to our position.They now appeared penny sized.Because they were closer & the night was quiet,we noticed that if they were helicopters we'd be hearing the thump-thump of the blades or distinguish the small blinking lights that can be seen on aircraft at an even greater distance.
the objects centered themselves over the western horizon at 30 degrees from the horizon then came to a stop for over a minute.Suddenly all four objects shot out in four different directions.All of them streaked across the sky so quickly we had trouble following them with our eyes & heads.The one on the left of the diamond had moved w & s just above the house line on the horizon,the one on the right had moved to roughly the same position but on the n & w.The top & bottom of the diamond flew in a line(one after the other)& ended up clear across the sky on the e horizon.They stopped @ about 60 degrees off the eastern horizon & then seperated.The top one flew s @ the same degree line.The remaining one flew to the n.We all watched them for a few minutes.They remained motionless.We each turned in a different direction & kept asking one another about the objects(out of our sight)in order to keep them all in sight collectively.
six or seven minutes later all four objects sped in to their original formation(as a diamond).Once again they traversed the sky @ speeds we could barely follow & met up slightly n at about 80 degrees from the northern horizon.When they met up,the intensity of the red light grew for about 30 seconds.Then they rose in the same pattern with their light getting weaker & weaker until we could no longer see them.
the next day my father & sister called hafb & the miam-dade police department(mdpd,@ that time it was transitioning a name change from metropolitan dade sherrif's office to metro-dade police department)to see if any calls had come in to report the incident.She was answered by hafb that the air force was aware of those reports and abruptly hung up on.The mdpd also seemed disinterested in obtaining any details on the incident.
content.summary: Four objects made impossible maneuvers

content.detailedDescription: Walking home down woburn st from late night movie spotted with a female friend suddenly a sphereical object with lights rotating?? blinking?? totally silent about 100-200 feet almost directly above us ----looked at one another said "what is that" watched for 1-3 min and as suddenly as it had appeared it disappeared in a flash ,silently---thoughts :disbelief, not at all scared ,amazement -- wondered if anyone else saw it --- nothing in paper next day --contacted no one and until recently have never discussed it again or told anyone other than one or two people.Prompted to report after recent sightings in texas ---not at all sure about year seen??
content.summary: Saw a ufo late night with female,nurse friend

content.detailedDescription:
Six people. 9:15 pm, 08-01-1982. campted on north fork of white river that runs from southern missouri into arkansas. facing east at canoe outfitters camp site. a large sphere shaped object, maybe 75-100 feet across, colored orange similar to a pumkin rose above the ridge that borders the river about .5 to 1 mile away. the object "pulsated" in color, radiating different shades of the orange color like it was "reving up its engines". no noise during the entire time. it then progressed due west towards us until it reached the river a block or so to our south. it then made a hard, sharp right turn at the same altitude, maybe 500 to 1,000 feet up, to the south. the object flew south for about 1/2 mile and then made a sharp/hard turn to the west and accelerated speed while rising in altitude at an angle of maybe ten degrees for about a mile or so. it then "cloaked" itself within a second or two, so it was no longer visible. completely silent the entire time. 

at 9:15 the scene repeated itself exactly as before. the object rose and transversed the identical path in the same manner as the first one. two other campers a short distance to our north, heard us calling and came to join us. so eight people witnessed the event and all saw exactly the same thing to our wonder and amazement.

at 9:30 a slightly larger object rose and proceeded to do the same type of "pulsating" in color. we called the larger one the "mother ship". the big difference in this occurance was the appearance of four silver colored cigar shaped objects rose vertically from behind the ridge about 1/4 mile to our north. these objects hovered for a short time and then flew south directly into the large orange object, one after the other. the larger object the transversed the identical path in the same manner as the first two, and disappeared. 

at aprox. 10:30 a small single engine plane could be seen flying a grid pattern over the general area. the plane appeared to be a little to the north and east of where the occurance was. this went on for 15-20 minutes.

the canoe outfitter reacted strangely to the story the next morning, smiling, and said "...He sure had not seen anything like that..." from his back deck that faced the ridge, but he had been inside watching tv all night.

our group's collective opinion was that the object were in fact "other worldly" and no us technology of that time was involved in these feats. the appearance of a search plane backs up this opinion, since these were truly ufos and were being searched for my someone.

end of story
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sighting of three large orange color and four silver colored ufos over 45 minute time period.

content.detailedDescription: On december 19th my kids and i were driving home from dublin going south on 377 to proctor. as we left dublin i noticed very large orange "circle" just to the right of the road but way up in the sky. it was a bit cloudy that night so i thought nothing of it, i thought that it was probably the moon just trying to peak threw the clouds. but after we drove about 5 miles my son and i noticed that it was moving. not moving fast but moving in differant directions. when i first noticed it, it was to the right of the road and by the time i got to the county line of erath and comanche it was slightly to my left. now i know the road does curve just a tad at the county line but not that much. i called a friend that lives in dublin to tell her to go look outside and see if she could see anything. she couldnt due to trees but she reminded me to take a picture. i grabbed my camera and took a couple of pictures but most of them didnt turn out ( blank pictures). as we drove on further, closer to home, we had to made a complete 90 degree turn in proctor, so the orange light was behind us.Note that my 9 year old was watching this light the whole time. he kept saying "it's a ufo mom!" and i would just tell him its the moon.  about 2 miles down that road the orange light was in front of us again just to our left! by the time i turned down our county road we had lost track of it due to tall trees. but after all this talk about seeing lights in the sky in dublin and stephenville, i honestly think this was something other than the moon. oh and as for the pictures, about a week after this happened, i was going to through the pictures on my digital camera, and thought "what do i need this for" and deleted it. it wasn't a close up picture because of how high it was and because it was so cloudy, but it was have been interesting to share. anyways, i was never the type to freak out or even believe in ufo's and i even feel silly telling everyone but it's ironic that other people have seen this same mysterious figure in the sky?!?
content.summary: My kids and i were traveling south on 377 when we noticed something orange in the sky....

content.detailedDescription: Vortex's opening up in the skies on a practically a nightly basis.Helicopter's chasing strange objects consistently.Things are becoming more obvious with regularity above us.Stars that aren't actually stars when you watch closely and patiently.Yellowish-white headlights on front of craft patroling skies,especially from sunset to about two hours afterwards.These are in fact peak times for letting out the smaller scout crafts with the blinking crisp red and white lights.Chemtrails have been  constantly sprayed here lately to hide the consistant movements and patterns of these extra-dimensional objects.Objects lately have included huge rectangular crafts 350 feet long and 80 feet wide moving north-east  to south-west.Also a huge cylinder craft moving basically north-east to south-west also.Does this have any correlation to the many sitings as of late in texas?Investigation will be necessary soon.I will buy and begin filming soon  with an above average camcorder.Thank you for your time!
content.summary: Cover-up obvious- on basically a nightly basis

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting took place just a few days after my 11th birthday.I was playing alone in my parents backyard into the early evening hours when i felt as if someone was watching me.The sun had already set but the sky  was still light enough to be able to easily make out features.I turned to the south (and slightly east) looking to see if anyone was there.I saw noone.I turned back around to continue playing when the feeling of being watched intensified and i heard a low sound almost like an electric buzzing (sort of like a denser version of the electrical static heard when standing under/near high power tension lines).
this time when i turned around i not only looked straight ahead but up as i noticed something metallic partly obscured behind and above a large avocado tree in the yard.At first i thought that the "goodyear" blimp whas in sight (an object that was quite common in s. florida in those years),but with a different hum.I headed wsw in the yard to gain a better vantage point not obscured by the avocado tree when i realized that this was not the blimp.The object was football shaped and about 10yrds long and 5yrds at the fattest point in the center top to bottom.It was about 1/2 a mile away and 1200-1500 feet up.The color was a dull metallic that seemed to glow in certain areas for short amounts of time before glowing in another area.I could not make out any set pattern to the glowing areas.The object had no basket/engine module underneath and no propeller or rudders.In front it had a series of rectangular windows similar to a cockpit's.That area was also slightly jutted out and squared.Along the entire front,side and back it had a rim similar to a hat brim widest in the front and less wide all around.I noticed no writing/marks on the object.
at first the object seemed to be hovering and the front was facing nnw and turning slightly towards the wnw.I was felt threatened and was both terrified and frozen for a few minutes.Finally i was able to move behind a bush to seek safety (the feeling of danger would not stop).When i looked through the bushes at the object it had stopped turning and hovered there for a while.I gathered my courage and ran to the back of my father's p/u truck parked in the back yard next to the shed.The object seemed to follow me by facing me at my new vantage poit (i could see its front again)but this time it had also lept forward to be almost directly above.The noise/humming was now gone and it had traversed this distance (1/2 a mile) in the blink of an eye.As i gathered up the courage to run for the back door of the house i also screamed and was met by my grandfather who looked up in time with me to see the object head staight up without making a sound and dissappearing from view within seconds.We had just enough time to see what looked like small half round glass orbs on its belly (they resembled the security domes at stores imbedded in the ceilings).Once the object had started to rise i felt less panicked and normal.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A football shaped object hovered  about 100 feet above tree-line then sped off.

content.detailedDescription:
My 3 friends and i were really bored one night, so we went for a drive and ended up on an out of town /backroads adventure.  
we were in a mini van that had plenty of window space, and the night sky was clear, and i was enjoying the view......
... when we saw a saucer shaped object-- in the middle of it was a row of lights that were flashing  blue, red, and yellowish white.  the whole row of lights appeared to be rotating - while the lights were flashing individually. 
we hurried up and pulled over and stopped to watch it.  we just kept saying to each other, "om my gosh! look at that!"
it was still just light enough outside to be able to see some details.
and the lights were very bright colors.
it hovered for a moment more and i got really afraid it was looking at us
well all i remember after that was it darting to the side and in split second timing it raced away.
i still have very strong emotions that surface when i think of it, even though it was many years ago--- and i have recently seen a photo that someone posted of a 1987 ufo that almost made me fall out of my chair! it was like a flash of emotional shock fear, and it took alot of courage to make this report.  
but i know someone who actually called to report the same sighting, and was told "yes ,we are keeping an eye on it, thank for your concern "....
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: iowa ufo 1988

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving from comanche, tx to brownwood, tx south on hwy 377 on january 8, 2008 when i saw a bright red light out of the corner of my eye up in the sky. i told my husband to look and asked him what he thought it was. i thought it was one of those towers that have 3 blinking red lights. i asked my husband what he thought it was. it then turned bright white. my husband commented that it could be a satellite . but then it faded out and appeared again just to the right of where it had originally been. then all of the sudden there were two of them. then, before we knew it they jetted off over the sky extremely fast. we just laughed it off, because we felt crazy for even thinking that it could be a ufo. then we saw it on the news the other night. i couldn't believe other people had seen it too! stephenville is getting all of the attention, but i believe that is was right over comanche. i know it was directly over comanche because i remember i was looking straight up out of my windshield to see it. i feel crazy for even reporting this, but i had to tell somebody!
content.summary: I was driving in my car and looked up into the sky to see a red light turn white and then zip off.

content.detailedDescription:
I stood out of my home in the middle of the day and saw an interesting jet trail in the sky.  i took a picture of it on my digital camera and
down loaded on to my computer. it was very interesting. however it was not until a year later that on closer inspection i notice a strange object in the picture. this is the second sighting i have witnessed
by my home. i have alredy once been interviewed by a mufon agent once before.
it was nice to be able to speak with someone who understands. 
i am sending a copy of the picture. 

                                                sincerely 
                                                 chris
content.summary: Capture  object  while photographing something else.

content.detailedDescription:
Wife, myself and baby coming home from sister in-laws. some of the details are faint seeing this was in 1994.(i just found this site today)
at around 8:00 pm we had just passed through island,ky on hwy 431 south and was starting down a small hill onto about a mile long straight away with fields on each side when my wife and i noticed a very bright white light shining down from the sky at what looked to be at the end of the straight away we were on. this light was not moving just hovering above the ground at maybe 500 ft or less, which led us both to believe it was a helicopter.As we approached the end of the straightaway we were on the light was almost directly overhead and still glowing. we were both looking out into the field to see what was happening and trying to figure if this was a helicopter or not. i pulled the car off onto a gravel driveway and the light went out instantly, i got out of the car and could make out an object overhead. this is way out in the country and it is dark and quiet at this time of the night. the odject was very dark and only a outline could be made out. it appeared to be triangular in shape with the edges more rounded the squared and now that the bright light that was coming from the bottom was no longer on there were no lights at all that could be seen anywhere on this object. that was when i realized it was making no sound at all. i told my wife to turn the car off and listen, you could hear the insects and this object was 500' or so directly overhead. then it started to move at a nne direction across the road and the adjoining field. it did not just blast away but at a slow pace it just continued out of sight with no sound at all coming from it. this entire occurance lasted maybe 3 minutes at most from first seeing the light to it moving across the roadway and away.For a long time we just wrote it off as something military but the more i think about it maybe it could have been a ufo.
content.summary: Black or dark object , 500' above ground, no sound/silent, white light from bottom
